a.n: For fun only - jumping over the limits

p.k: In this series of programs with the common title "FOR FUN", we talk about people who have run away[escaped?] from everyday life to the world of their passions
p.d: In this series of programs with the common title "FOR FUN", we talk about people who have run away[escaped?] from everyday life to the world of their passions. The first set in the series is devoted to sports activities â€“ from the very popular horse riding, through off-road, to ballooning and gliding. "FOR FUN" presents the most important elements of each discipline in an easy-to-understand manner, explains the principles for their participation, and describes the necessary equipment and skills to be applied. The "FOR FUN" series is a film journey into the world of incredible hobbies. The first episode in the set is devoted to people whose passion is horse riding. On the parcours of one of the Polish stud farms, we meet the future stars of riding and their incredible coach. We talk about the beauty of this sport as well as how to learn to ride step by step.
